articles.title: USA regains Ryder Cup after dominant display, Rory McIlroy in tears after Europe's humbling - ABC News
articles.description: The United States dominates from start to finish, beating Europe in the 43rd edition of the Ryder Cup.
articles.content:
The United States has comprehensively beaten Europe in the 43rd Ryder Cup at Whistling Straits in Wisconsin.

articles.title: Same-sex marriage referendum approved by wide margin in Switzerland | TheHill - The Hill
articles.description: Switzerland has become one of the last Western European countries...
articles.content:
Switzerland has become one of the last Western European countries to make same-sex marriage legal, Reuters reported.
A nearly two-thirds majority, or 64 percent of the country, approved the measure … [+994 chars]

articles.title: Iceland elects Europe's first women-majority parliament - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Iceland does not have legal quotas on female representation in parliament.
articles.content:
ICELAND TODAY BECAME the first country in Europe to have more women than men in parliament, a day after a general election that saw the left-right coalition win a clear majority.
